title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 232-2.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 232-2.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart
applies to all perchloroethylene (perc) dry cleaning equipment at new and
existing dry cleaning facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
232-2.1

Adopted

New

York State Register February 28, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 09, eff. 3/9/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
